about_the_game:
Your bunker's last expedition never returned and it's up to just you and three other friends. Fix the bunker's power, reestablish communication systems, and gather food and supplies to survive another night! Explore the territory around your bunker as you solve puzzles, avoid monsters, find secrets, and complete objectives through one or multiple nights depending on your risk level and skill!

Survive

Players will face horrors both seen and unseen and it will take careful planning and execution to restore the bunker without becoming yet another statistic.

Explore

Learn about what happened to the world, your bunker, and those around you as you explore the dimly lit and ill-fated surroundings.

Gameplay

* Solve puzzles
* Be scared!
* Players can return to their bunker with supplies to save their progress, or they can risk it all and get it done in one night
